risks.evidence: The proposed increase is significantly above our budget allocation for this year.
We've received competitive quotes that are more aligned with our budget.

actions.text: Prepare custom pricing proposal for renewal
Document feature roadmap for next year
Send contract amendment for legal review

summary: Annual renewal negotiation meeting. Customer raised pricing concerns citing budget constraints and competitive alternatives. Account team committed to custom pricing proposal with multi-year discount options. Feature roadmap to be shared. Contract amendment pending legal review. Executive sponsor call planned to secure renewal.
